Package progetto.view.commandline.commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCLViewCommand
    Abstract class extended by every command of the command line view
    AbstractStateSwitcherCommand
    Abstract class extended by a group of commands which need to change the state of the command line view after their execution
    CancelUseOfToolCardCommand
    Command to cancel the use of a tool card
    ChoosePickedDiceCommand
    Command to select the dice from the picked ones to use with a tool card
    ChoosePlayerBoardDiceCommand
    Command to select the dice from the playerBoard to use with a tool card
    ChooseRoundTrackDiceCommand
    Command to select the dice from the ones in the round track to use with a tool card
    ChooseValueDiceCommand
    Command to select the value of a dice when permitted by a tool card
    CloseGameCommand
    Command to close the game
    ConnectionCommand
    Command to create a socket or a RMI connection to the server
    ContinueCommand
    Command to go in the ContinueGameState
    ContinueGameCommand
    Command to continue a past game
    CreateRoomCommand
    command to create a new room
    EndTurnCommand
    Command to end the turn
    IncreaseDecreseCommand
    Command to increase or decrease the value of a dice when permitted by a tool card
    JoinRoomCommand
    Command to join a room
    NewGameCommand
    Command to start a new game
    PickDiceCommand
    Command to pick a dice from the extracted ones
    PlaceDiceCommand
    Command to place a dice on the playerboard
    ReturnCommand
    Command to return to a specified state
    SelectChairCommand
    Command to go to the ChairSelectionState
    SelectWindowCommand
    Command to select a window frame at the beginning of the game
    SetNameCommand
    Command to set the name of the user
    SetNumberOfPlayersCommand
    Command to set the number of players of a game
    SetSinglePlayerDiceAction
    Command to select the dice to sacrifice to use a tool card in single player mode
    SetSinglePlayerDifficultyCommand
    commmand to set the difficulty of a single player game
    ShowDicesCommand
    Command to show extracted dices
    ShowExtractedDicesCommand
    Command to show extracted dices
    ShowObjectivesCommand
    Command to show public and private objective cards
    ShowPickedDicesCommand
    Command to show picked dices of the user
    ShowPlayerBoardCommand
    Command to show the playerboard of a player
    ShowPlayerBoardRequestCommand
    Command to go to the ShowPlayerBoardState
    ShowRoomCommand
    Command to go to the RoomsChoiceState
    ShowRoundTrackCommand
    Command to show the round track
    ShowToolCardsCommand
    Command to go to the ShowToolCardState
    SitOnChairCommand
    Command to sit on a chair
    SolveToolCardCommand
    Command to solve a tool card
    StartGameCommand
    Command to start the game
    StartNewGameCommand
    Command to return to the DefaultViewState
    UpdateCommand
    Command to update the list of the existing rooms
    UseToolCardCommand
    Command to use a tool card
